item.description:
From the Coen Brothers ... "Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it. Stars: Jeff Bridges, John Goodman and Julianne Moore.
The movie starts at 2, we would meet at 1:30. We can got to Mama Iguana's (Mexican, across the street), Packard's (a pub, behind Mama Iguana's), Pizza Paradiso (one block away) or Northampton Brewery (two blocks away, live music every Sunday from 3-6) after the movie.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a red jacket, Salena will be wearing a red coat, Jennifer will be wearing an orange coat, anyone else? We will meet in the lobby between 1:30 and 1:45?
item.name: "The Big Lebowski" - Academy of Music - Northampton - 1/30/11
